desc.p: The Currency Bought in the FOREX transaction.
No input field, automatically updated by the system when the FX.TRANSACTION record is created.
Standard T24 numeric field.
A maximum of 002 characters may be entered.

This is the revaluation currency equivalient of the amount bought in the original FOREX contract that gave rise to the FX.TRANSACTION record. It is the amount in the revaluation currency at the rate applicable when the FOREX contract was entered.
This field is updated at authorisation of the FOREX contract and remains unchanged during the lifetime of the contract.
No input field automatically updated by the system when the FOREX transaction that gave rise to the FX.TRANSACTION record is authorised.
This field will only be updated if the system revalues FOREX contracts against a currency other than the local currency. (i.e. The REVAL.CCY field on FX.PARAMETERS has been populated.)
A maximum of 19 characters may be entered.
